fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player, Gain access to their player channel during the night, your target is notified of this. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be blackmailed for the next day if you invade the home of an evil faction member.
- If you are out of ammo, you gain 1 ammo for doing nothing during the night.
- You will also steal their toaster.
